sections.title: Raise your flag!
sections.description: Show your support by hanging a rainbow flag where you live.

sections.title: Buy our Merch
sections.description: We sell caps, shopping nets, stickers and flags. All the money goes directly to Henningsvær Pride. You can buy our merch at MIN Henningsvær or secondhand and div in Henningsvær.

sections.title: Follow us on Instagram
sections.description: @henningsvaer.pride Here we share pictures and information about Pride week.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.cta: Find more images in our ::media section:: or on Instagram ::@henningsvær.pride::
